Investigator Laki:
Here, take this for now. Just give me a minute to gather a breath, and I'll have details for you regarding what I want you to do.

- Note: You can develop yourself through quests and hunting at the hunting grounds of the Plains of the Lizardmen. You have finished all tasks related to Kekropus' Letter. Please work on the quest The Minstrel's Song at Lv. 85.
